summary: Use this API to move products to the top in a creator's showcase
description:
Use this API to move products to the top in a creator's showcase. The platform will return the error code and error message if the pinning operation fails. Version
202409
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

header.description: The creator access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 1. Follow this guide to get creator access_token.

body.description: The product IDs to move to the top in a creator's showcase. If multiple products are provided, they will display according to the order passed in this parameter.

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages are returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.
Every request generates a unique request_id for logging purposes.
